name: Hide N' Seek
description:
Welcome to the first ever Hide N' Seek game from Network5 on PC!

Find 10 characters in a very large, and a great designed map! Find all 10 characters, and you win the game! In hide mode, run away and hide from the blue robot! Do not let him catch you. How long can you stay away? In explore the map mode, explore the map at your own will and get a good feel of the map.

Key Features:

- Large Map

- 10 Characters to Find

- Hide Mode

- Explore The Map Freely

Have fun!
